Uses of Class
rogel.io.fopl.formulas.Predicate

  • Packages that use Predicate 
    Package Description
    rogel.io.fopl.proof
    Contains classes relevant to logic proofs with FOPL.
    rogel.io.fopl.proof.tree
    The classes in this package form the foundation of the logic-based reasoner, which solves the logical satisfiability problem: given a set of facts about some domain, and a query over that domain, does there exist a set of Substitutions that satisfy the query?

    • Uses of Predicate in rogel.io.fopl.proof

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Predicate HornClause.getConsequent()
      Gets this HornClause's consequent.
      Constructors in rogel.io.fopl.proof with parameters of type Predicate 
      Constructor and Description
      HornClause(Predicate fact)
      Constructs a HornClause with just one positive literal.
      HornClause(Predicate consequent, Formula antecedent)
      Constructor for a HornClause with one positive literal and a goal clause (which represents implicitly disjunctive negated literals).
